problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): Election day volunteers are typically from all different parts of the community, and this year a parking attendant and a chemical engineer were interviewed about their experiences as poll workers. The parking attendant talked about how important elections are, but admitted to having mostly avoided doing any actual work this year and mostly just sat around all day. The chemical engineer, on the other hand, was exhausted after a long and busy day of helping people to vote.
Question: Who was very hard-working?
ans0: The parking attendant
ans1: The chemical engineer
ans2: Not answerable
